title: Place of Interest Profile
description: Defines a notable place such as ruins, dungeons, sacred sites, battlefields, or mysterious locations. These are places worth visiting or exploring beyond ordinary settlements.

story.description: The narrative or legend associated with this place

history_entries.description: Historical events tied to this location

current_occupants.description: Who or what currently inhabits or guards this place

secrets.description: Hidden truths, buried treasure, concealed passages, etc.

overgrowth_erosion.description: For ruins: how overgrown or eroded the location is -- climate determines rate (rainforest consumes quickly, desert buries with sand). Material durability matters: stone lasts centuries, wood rots first, roofs collapse first.

building_material.description: Primary building material and its durability -- stone, wood, advanced technology. Locals may have stolen materials for reuse.

items_left_behind.description: Magical, technological, or valuable items abandoned here -- who might find them, and are they cursed?

accessibility.description: How difficult it is to reach or enter

known_by.description: Who knows about this place (common knowledge, scholars only, legend, forgotten)

x-cross-references.sovereign-power-profile: May be within a sovereign power's territory
